rachel was staring into the sky through an expressionless glass window her eyes locked on something on the horizon PERIOD An intimidating blanket of dark gray was suspended over her university campus almost as if the sky consciously wanted to warn everyone of

At a big university surrounded by the sounds and lights of a city there was nothing unusual in the air PERIOD College students were being let out of their classrooms and droves of relaxed voices resounded throughout the massive marbleencrusted hallways filled with

From finding condoms in our orientation packets to finding new friends in our halls orientation was a week not soon forgotten PERIOD Orientation had time to socialize but also incorporated workshops focusing on drugs and alcohol identity and inclusion healthy relationships and consent PERIOD
